document.full_text: bank of japan board member seiji nakamura said solid global growth will help japan's recovery accelerate later this year but warned that the country cannot afford policy paralysis when the wounds of the devastating earthquake in march have yet to heal.
document.title: boj's nakamura upbeat on japan recovery
lines_and_colors: bank of japan board member seiji nakamura said solid global growth will help japan's recovery accelerate later this year but warned that the country cannot afford policy paralysis when the wounds of the devastating earthquake in march have yet to heal.
